location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to C Cookney, Acting Lieutenant, Commander of the Barbara Pattamai

mods.abstract: The letter is instructing the Commander of the Barbara Pattamaito land his own crew at Bushire in preparation for receiving men, seamen, and provisions from HMS Lion. It also instructs the Commander to place himself under the orders of Captain Heathcote.
